# Preliminary Information {.unnumbered}

This is DS Skill Crafting Space to demonstrate data science knowledge base from perspectives of coding, statistics, probability, machine learning and deep learning using Python.

As this uses R Markdown, Python must be used through the `reticulate` interface.
